/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in hues of red and white, rise high into the clear blue sky. Their facades are adorned with numerous windows, reflecting the sunlight and adding a touch of brightness to the cityscape.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars and bicycles, parked neatly along the sides, hint at the daily life and rhythm of the city. Trees line the street, their green leaves contrasting with the urban environment and adding a touch of nature to the scene.

The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of vibrancy and energy, characteristic of a busy city street.
